lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because:
I lend because I can.

" Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person"

Mother Theresa
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy homes by working with a bank to lend them money.

lenders.name: Pat and Jim
lenders.loan_because: It makes us feel great to help someone far away.  To be able to insure their children's future.  To be able to educate them and improve their lives.  Our own children do not need much financial help anymore.  It feels good to offer someone a better future.
lenders.occupational_info: we don't work at a job anymore.  I used to be a supervisor at a printing facility within General Motors and my husband used to do computer work.  Now we play with our grand children and try to have fun in our lives.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I think not all aid to the poor needs to come thru mega-charities or governmental agencies. There are other niches of need and Kiva has addressed one in an innovative way. I like that I can connect to an individual - know their name, their face and a little about their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graphic designer. I design everything from book covers to billboards.

lenders.name: Magdalena
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance

lenders.name: Nils Lipecki
lenders.loan_because: Because I belive that grassroot development is preferable to charity.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I am a entrepreneur and I know how hard it is to get people to help me.   When I saw what you all have done I thought I could give atless $25 to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I photograph family portraits,children,weddings,entertainer,tv,magazines,sports,movies,working on a couple of books

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a potter.  I like to work with my hands and make things.

lenders.name: N, J, and family
lenders.loan_because: Our family wants to help.
lenders.occupational_info: computer software/hardware, urban planner, our children are college and high school students.

lenders.name: Cavalier FBLA
lenders.loan_because: It is important to offer others equal opportunities if you are in a position to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: We strive to improve ourselves through learning about the world around us and helping where we can.

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in life and feel that I should give back to the world in some way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in hotels.

lenders.name: Guneet
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others, even if its one individual at a time.

lenders.name: Sanya
lenders.occupation: believer in the goodness of humanity

lenders.name: WUSC Humber
lenders.loan_because: Our mission is to foster human development and global understanding through education and training.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a student organization called World University Service of Canada (wusc).  Our local branch is in Humber College, Toronto.

lenders.name: Piotr
lenders.loan_because: it is a pleasure

lenders.name: Derwin
lenders.loan_because: I want to provide the opportunity to others to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Information & Communication Technology.

lenders.name: Polly
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to change the paradigm. For the better.

lenders.name: Irene
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference where ever I can.

lenders.name: Simona&Gerard
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help great people !

lenders.name: Congregational Church
lenders.loan_because: Our Christian faith compels us to love and care for others and to share the blessings we are given by God.
lenders.occupational_info: Christian Church in Waterville, Maine, USA

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to have the chance at a better life. This is my way of giving someone else that chance..

lenders.name: Violeta
lenders.loan_because: Clothing sales
lenders.occupational_info: I show the clothes to my customers in their houses or sometime in my house

lenders.name: Markus Amanto
lenders.loan_because: I believe work is love in action. I believe sites like Kiva empower people. When we spread more love and empowerment the world becomes a better place for our children.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people develop their potential in life, business and relationships.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: Even though I'm barely getting by myself, I can spare $50/yr to make a difference in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories through plays, music and live performance.

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.loan_because: I work full-time and also attend school at nights to get my MBA.  I've been trying for a very long time to figure out a way to help others without the time commitment that ...  - in all sincerity - I do not have at the moment.  Because I am originally from Costa Rica I understand the difficulties some of these individuals go through in their own countries to get above poverty levels.  I'm so glad I heard about Kiva!  Thanks to all of you who have supported this program and thanks to the individuals who spearheaded Kiva...  Hopefully I'll be able to see sponsors from Costa Rica very soon…
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the Finance and Information Systems department in my company to help bring about technology-based solutions to the business issues the company faces every day.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I spent my career working for US AID, and learned how important microcredit loans can be.  Besides that, it makes  me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I spned a lot of time volunteering my services.  My favorite acitivies are giving tours of historical sites and museums.

lenders.name: Terence
lenders.loan_because: "The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago.  The next best time is now." ~Chinese Proverb

lenders.name: Travis and Elaine
lenders.loan_because: We never go to bed with the worry of putting food on the table, or a roof over our heads, but we remember what it feels like.
lenders.occupational_info: We write stories for the movies, we take pictures and we develop content for the internet,

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to help change people's lives a little at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: As the writer of "Wordplay", the official blog of The New York Times crossword puzzle, I am the online voice of of puzzle solvers around the world. I also construct crosswords for The Onion and BUST Magazine, and am a humor writer whose book "It's Not PMS, It's You" (Sterling) is available where all fine literature is sold.

lenders.name: Cheryl Sultan
lenders.loan_because: My wish is for a world filled with love, peace and prosperity.  My passion is helping women in Nicaragua, as this is part of my heritage and I have seen first hand the poverty that exists in this country. No child should die of starvation, ever.

lenders.name: Philippe
lenders.loan_because: I'm convinced of the need and of the solution
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working on imaging solution for mobile phone.

lenders.name: Bhanu Mullapudi
lenders.loan_because: Its not a give away, its lending. The people who receive money have responsibility to payback, which I think makes them powerful and gives a lasting support, unlike one-time charity benefit.
lenders.occupational_info: I design software for computers. I enable innovation at work.

lenders.name: Vikki
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometime in their lives. And to be able to repay that help by helping others, is what it's all about.

lenders.name: Students at OU
lenders.occupational_info: We are a marketing class at Oakland University, MI.

lenders.name: Kendra
lenders.loan_because: I know that I'm fortunate to live where I do and to have the resources that I have.  I want to help other women to succeed as well.

lenders.name: Alesia
lenders.loan_because: It's a Beautiful thing to give!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: my mom says its a good thing to do. I can help people who don't have much money in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: a North American dollar goes farther in a developing nation.

lenders.name: Maxshi
lenders.loan_because: Even a small amount can change a life.

lenders.name: LUIS EDUARDO
lenders.occupational_info: en la actividad agricola y pecuaria ya que poseo una finca pequeña y desearia invertir en la compra de ganado al destete en un plazo de 365 dias

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: We are family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in college who is studying to be a pastor for teenagers.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I have so much: they have so little
lenders.occupational_info: I help dying people to live until they die

lenders.name: Jeannine & John
lenders.loan_because: we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Software Engineer, and John is s social work who supports homeless people in Denver.

lenders.name: Ann & Dana
lenders.loan_because: Helping to pass it along!
lenders.occupational_info: We paint houses, inside and out.  We also invest in real estate on a small scale with rental houses and flipping houses.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I could not pass up the opportunity to personally help someone become self-sufficient.  What an incredible chance to support women around the world to be successful in business.  Thank you Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: As a Financial Advisor / Trust Officer, I manage investment accounts in varying degrees.  It can be as simple as administering funds wherever directed, or as a Trustee, I may be responsible for paying bills and determining how much money a beneficiary will receive.  It is a rewarding occupation with the opportunity to meet and work with a variety of people.

lenders.name: Keith & Kay
lenders.loan_because: We've been very fortunate to get to follow our hearts.  We want to help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info:
Keith: musician, retired Music Professor
Kay: Pilates instructor, Adjunct Professor at Belmont University

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: Feels good to help people move themselves forward on their terms.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people start businesses and sustain their families in good health. I think private assistance is more efficient than government assistance. This is the what USAID should be about.
lenders.occupational_info: I did research and managed large projects involving military logistics, air and rail safety.  I left government after many years and now have an active social and intellectual life. With university degrees in international relations, I love to travel, learn and experience other cultures.

lenders.name: Valery
lenders.loan_because: Giving back to people who are trying to achieve their dreams and goals  in life.  You can wins!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with kids who have low scores in school, my efforts are to help them raised, achieve and go further.
Never giving up to learn, failure is not an option.

lenders.name: Dr. Patrick Mendis
lenders.loan_because: These courageous micro-entrepreneurs remind me that I was like one of them when I was growing up with 13 water-buffaloes on a three-acre rice field in Sri Lanka.  I know the value of micro-loan, which helped my family to break-away from the cycle of poverty caused by poor rice harvest, unpredictable monsoon, or simply being poor.  A small loan could transform a person, a family, a village, and a nation.
lenders.occupational_info: As an AFS (American Field Service) scholar I came to Minnesota in 1978 to study. After my government service in Washington, I returned to academia. Now I am an affiliate professor of public and international affairs at George Mason University. With the sales of my recent books, I established a number of tsunami scholarships and a Peace Prize in Sri Lanka.  All proceeds after income tax are donated to charity and micro-finance programs. [Photo: With Jessica Jackley Flannery, the co-founder of Kiva at the U.S. Chamber of Commerce in Washington, DC].

lenders.name: Farzana Kashfi
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference, however small...
lenders.occupational_info: I work to empower adolescent girls, living in rural Bangladesh

lenders.name: The Merringers
lenders.loan_because: We want our children to live in the best world possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home to raise our two sons, while my husband sells sporting equipment.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I was born in the right place and the right time. I've been lucky.

lenders.name: Chanah & Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I like to contribute my part in making this world a better place for others.
lenders.occupational_info: Project Manager for a major Pharmaceutical Company

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world little by little

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.occupation: Retired attorney and retired ESL teacher
lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful way to help others provide for  themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: As a volunteer attorney I help immigrants in the United States with their immigration-related legal problems.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of an organization like Kiva, that can connect people across oceans and between continents.  Living in such an economically blessed country, I feel an obligation to give back however I can, and this provides an amazing opportunity to do so!
lenders.occupational_info: I study at a university in the United States, and am planning to get an undergraduate degree in History and Spanish soon!

lenders.name: Allen
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me, and I am happy to share that blessing with others. May God, through his son Jesus Christ bless all who look to him for their needs.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 17 and 18 year old students about government, business and money.

lenders.name: Roseann
lenders.loan_because: A little sharing can make a huge difference.

lenders.name: Tonja
lenders.loan_because: There are so many people out on the street asking for money.  Loaning money for someone to better themselves seems right and good.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to give other people the chance to start their own business. I started my own business and understand how hard it is to raise money for tools/supplies.
lenders.occupational_info: I record sound for TV shows, commercials and documentaries.

lenders.name: San
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans make a difference.  A little from me make a difference in present and future for individuals and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people plan and manage their investment savings so that they can live their desired financial future.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this. I want to help other people be empowered. I have had times in my life when I have needed help, and now it's my turn to give back - and I do so very happily!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a change agent. Right now my job is working on changing my thoughts and beliefs about myself and the world I live in to positive ones that bring me peace and joy!

And for everyone requesting loans - I say go for it!! Grab onto your idea and don't let go. You can do it!!

lenders.name: motoko
lenders.occupational_info: housewife

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: God blesses me with the gift of lending.
lenders.occupational_info: I help guide students through school to get a college education.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: We need to create a world that works for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make things beautiful.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Why should I have so much with ease when others struggle
lenders.occupational_info: I repair refrigeration and air conditioning machinery

lenders.name: Jude
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a difference, and the power of microfinance.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: We want to steward what we have been entrusted with.

lenders.name: K & F
lenders.loan_because: The Earth is too small not to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: agriculture

lenders.name: Dominic Hebert
lenders.loan_because: providing capital is an effective form of assistance.

lenders.name: Ginette
lenders.loan_because: I'm a blessed person and I have lived in many developing countries over the years. I think it's important for all of us who can, to support and give a hand to others. I love to help women to support themselves.

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: I like to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entertainer and musician.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: others have helped me in the past.

lenders.name: Dinah
lenders.loan_because: I am in the fortunate position of being able to lend a hand...
lenders.occupational_info: Brilliant!  I work in a public library.

lenders.name: Karl-Anders
lenders.loan_because: I believe in every entrepreneur's equal right to have access to the necessary funds to start or maintain a business.
lenders.occupational_info: Founder of a company working to make mobile phones easier and more fun to use.

lenders.name: Georgie
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly that the world can indeed be changed and improved by one random act of kindness at a time, and I intend to participate as often and in as meaningful a fashion as I humanly can! It's in the Book!
lenders.occupational_info: My primary work is as a mother of two small children - one of which is differently-abled.  I also work in the legal field part-time when I'm not trying to change the world!

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Maarten
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help an individual on the other side of the world! A loan is a great incentive to let the people grow and survive on their own, in stead of making them dependent on outside help.

lenders.name: 42 Forge
lenders.loan_because: The world is a small place.
lenders.occupational_info: 42 Forge is a organization consisting of a number of separate businesses  and projects:   Corporate Jester (business consulting and keynote speaking), Jardin Publishing (book publishing) and Portland Project (retailing a unique deck of cards featuring local artists).  For more information about 42 Forge, please email us at info@corporatejester.com.

lenders.name: Martijn
lenders.loan_because: Together we can make a difference! One small donation from me can have a huge impact on the life of someone in need!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a software engineer, implementing business solutions for companies to improve their efficiency and productivity.

lenders.name: Hana
lenders.loan_because: It's important to give, while you have the chance.
lenders.occupational_info: Interesting

lenders.name: JJ Quint Tim
lenders.loan_because: With a little help we make a better world

We are 3 boys. Quint is 4 month, Tim 10 years and JJ is 12 year old.
We loan 100$ from grandma Friday. So we have to pay her back.

lenders.name: Cari
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the nonprofit field. I hope to make the world a better place through passion and commitment.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make up for the misery that the Bush government causes the rest of the world
lenders.occupational_info: do what you can while you're here

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a more efficient way to help develop one's business, and I have a part of me that always wanted to do this!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a specialist in web analytics (a website's  daily stats): I analyse the collected data and make propositions to the company to make the website evolve in a more efficient way.

lenders.name: Pat and Frank
lenders.loan_because: it is so much fun to see very small business owners succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We like to find ways to make the world just a litle better.

lenders.name: Omar & Lisette
lenders.loan_because: I grew up an only child and pretty much had things made. I believe it is now time to give something back.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: each of us will be held accountable for how we manage our gifts, and how we treat those who are placed in our path.  Kiva widens my path.
lenders.occupational_info: manager of an arts and crafts store

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Working as a Business Development Manager I can appreciate that these people know they need help.  Many people today think that they can do it on their own.  That may be true.  But what I know is true is that together we can do more.  As a person born and raised in the "west", I know we have been blessed by geography and economy.  My wife teaches many children who have come from places like Sudan.  They were born in to places where civil war, poverty, and strife is common place.  The least we can do to help our fellow humans is use a service like KIVA and give someone a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with retail flooring stores and our company provides business solutions for them.  Such as products, pricing, promotion and financial benefits.

lenders.name: Danika
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good

lenders.name: Kelly Kaur
lenders.loan_because: I hope to be able to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I am into brand development and have been in the aviation field for the last 11 years.

lenders.name: Ram
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves.

lenders.name: GPC Freshmen
lenders.loan_because: We loan as a class--each student donates money and we vote about who we'd like to sponsor.
lenders.occupational_info: In my English classes, my goal is that students become engaged in the world and write from that experience. Kiva is a great way to introduce students to someplace outside of Kentucky.

lenders.name: Rosita
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserve a chance to live a good life.  God created us to lead a good life not be disparity or facing poverty.  Global problems are everyone's issue.
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteers, spiritual guidance and social worker.

lenders.name: JEANNE
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Working with local small businesses and individuals

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I am the son of refugees from Vietnam.  An entire community in Parnell, MO embraced my mom, dad and I in 1975 and helped us get on our feet by helping us financially and learning the language and culture.  I have been very fortunate to be able to live in such a great country and to have my own business.  This is a great way for me and my business to give back and embrace the entrepreneur's spirit worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a handyman/remodeling business.  When I'm not working, I enjoy spending time with my family and dogs.

lenders.name: Sonin Family
lenders.loan_because: Microloans ROCK!
lenders.occupational_info:
Juhan is a product designer.... designing things people use everyday.

Kate is a fashion designer.... designing clothes, bags, accessories.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: if I was in the same situation I hope someone would do the same for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a company that works so that others have a better life.

lenders.name: victoria
lenders.loan_because: I love the optimism and energy of these people.  They deserve a chance.

lenders.name: Snuggs
lenders.loan_because: People willing to work to help their family and themselves are worth the risk. A community is not counted by the number of outstreached palms in search of a handout. It is measured by the numbers of hands high in the air saying "we've had enough".

lenders.name: yolande
lenders.occupation: insurance advisor/social assistant for elder peopl

lenders.name: Deb P.
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of microcrdeit and the direct impact it can have on lives around the world.

lenders.name: Peter Cow
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to live more sustainably.

lenders.name: Seth
lenders.loan_because: because I love and follow Jesus Christ.  My life does not consist of the abundance of my possessions. Jesus said, "Whatever you did for one of the least of these you did for me."

lenders.name: Ally
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I believe in what Kiva is doing

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.occupation: Project Manager for Affordable Housing Org

lenders.name: Clare
lenders.loan_because: I have a little to share with those who are trying to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught teenagers the business skills needed to work in business office occupations until my retirement.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I feel everyone should be given the chance to live life to the fullest.  Why can't I be the catalyst to allow that to happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I study about politics and government.

lenders.name: vegivamp
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Priya
lenders.loan_because: it's what I want to do.  My uncle told me about kiva.org, and I thought it was such an amazing idea.  It helps people on both ends of the stick and increases awareness of our world that we live in.  Here, I feel like I can personally make a difference in someone else's life, even if I live thousands of miles away.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a college student!

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help others

lenders.occupation: Managing partner for BAM Strategy, divine.ca' , we

lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur at heart

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I am a Christian and we are commanded to love our neighbor. It seems more loving to me to give a loan to help someone than to give a handout. Loans help preserve the dignity of both parties, and a loan to start a business enables the borrower to gain independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college students how to use computers and how to build computer networks

lenders.name: liliane
lenders.loan_because: someone once did the same for me so ! it is obvious
lenders.occupational_info: My work is not a work it is a hobby, i like my job soooo much it does not feel like work

We provide memebers interesting events, build the platform for memeber to trust and assist one another. In addition, we support our members to accomplish their dreams in lives. The ultimate goal is to make members play creatively, live happily and expect to be the best partner for life in the world.

lenders.name: Hanne
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky - I would like to share that!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach a way to communicate that helps people solve their problems.

lenders.name: cecilia
lenders.loan_because: I know how though life can be
lenders.occupational_info: I like the idea of giving a hand and the way it is done through Kiva

lenders.name: Sofie
lenders.loan_because:
I think this is a great way of helping others in need. You actually get to see where your money goes. Because the money gets paid back, you can keep on supporting other people as well. 
I always wanted to volunteer in a charity organisation, but because I'm ill, that probably isn't going to happen. So this system is a good alternative!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm still a student, so I'm not working. I'm studying psychology.

lenders.name: Arnoldo
lenders.loan_because: There is people that are less fortunate than us.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer phones for a living

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: it helps people help themselves.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: It is one of the beautiful compensations of life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself--Ralph Waldo Emerson
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a very busy public library that serves a population of about 100,000 people

lenders.name: Bart
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an freelance internet consultant.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born and raised in a rich country. This lottery of birth should be appreciated.

lenders.name: Jack

lenders.occupational_info: I assist families in functioning more closely to the ways in which they want to function.

Utilize my strengths and skills as an organizer to engage my customers in real and meaningful ways and create a sense of community within Hungry Dog Designs.
To foster understanding and appreciation across cultures by putting a human face on the art/culture and providing a venue for customers and artists to build a personal connection.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: i have so much in the way of love, health and other wealth in my life, i want to share with others. i hope that my small loans can help put a smile on  someone's face and that smile in turn will put a smile on someone else's face.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: It's great way to share the blessings I've been given with others.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: I raised 4 children as a divorcee. I "reinvented" myself several times in an effort to better provide for my family.  I have been a Master Plumber and Electrician, went to nursing school in my 40's, and am now becoming a personal fitness trainer with a gym in my home.  I resigned my RN position to stay at home and care for my adult profoundly retarded and handicapped son.  I have been praying for money to operate my own business.  I suddenly felt selfish when I thought of the many others who have never had the chance to better their lives.  I hope my small loan will make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide full time care to my 40 year old son who is profoundly retarded and handicapped. I have purchased fitness equipment, am becoming certified as a fitness instructor and will operate a home business that offers personal fitness training. and nutritional consultation. In our country we have a great number of people who do not toil daily and have the need to improve their physical health.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I hope I can help someone even if it is in the smallest of ways.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse so I help care for people everyday.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.occupational_info: Then three of my children is what I have more important since it is that the shooting sustenance for the whole family.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It is selfish not to.  I studied Anthropology in college, which gave me a love for cultures and people  from around the globe.

lenders.occupational_info: I am writing a book on the names of God and I run a business painting rental homes before new tenants move in.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I know that a sound and healthy family is the basis of good community and the best way to support this idea is to make the family financially independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Registered Nurse caring for  people who are too sick to care for themselves. My mother used to say 'we do for others what they cannot do for themselves'. And when they get well, they go back to their life and loved ones. It is a caring work, requiring high level technical skills, on-going training and education, determination, intelligence and flexibility. It is not well paid but it is challenging every day.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because:
i've been annoyingly poor; & am now comfortably numb. This makes me a seriously pink Floyd (http://www.pinkfloyd.com/). I enjoy the music of Alan Hovhaness (http://www.hovhaness.com/), Harry Partch (http://www.harrypartch.com/),  Humphrey Searle & La Monte Young (http://www.melafoundation.org/) - also The Reels (http://www.myspace.com/therealreels), Chase Masterson (http://chasemasterson.com/), Brian Eno, Bob Log III (http://boblog111.com/) & Henry Rollins (http://henryrollins.com/)

My favourite writers are Stephen Fry (http://www.stephenfry.com/), Samuel Beckett (http://samuel-beckett.net/) & Dr Hunter S Thompson, my favourite artists are Charlotte Moorman, Ray & Charles Eames (http://eamesoffice.com/), Yoko Ono (http://imaginepeace.com/) & Carolee Schneemann (http://www.caroleeschneemann.com/), my favourite blog is Nana Visitor's (http://www.thekitchenwitches.blogspot.com.au/), my favourite tv show is Star trek: Deep Space 9 (http://www.startrek.com/page/star-trek-deep-space-nine) & my favourite film is Vertical Features Remake (http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0075386/)
The odds are good that you haven't heard of many of these names

I strongly suspect that this is my problem, not yours

I support dispersed computing using the BOINC platform (http://boinc.berkeley.edu/index.php), write (when i can),buy art (when i can afford to) as & support people through other crowd-sourced funding sites such as www.goodreturn.org (charitable) & www.kickstarter.com, www.pozible.com, www.Pledgemusic & Indiegogo.com; but Kiva - & my most beautiful Teresa - remain my most important life-affirmation

I suppose all this means that i'm just another Wile E Quixote in denial. If you forced me, i'd have to admit that i know that the damn things are windmills but i still choose to exercise my right to  tilt at them anyway. After all, one day they might be giants, & that's when i'll really need the practice....
lenders.occupational_info: Carting bloody big boxes out of 10m shipping crates, amongst other things. These crates are made of metal, which isn't pleasant during lightning strikes. I also drive a forklift truck, make computers do something ressembling what they are supposed to & try to be nice on the phone, not necessarily in that order
